participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and introspective, she often reflects on her emotions and seeks support from friends.
participant_1.background: My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax. I know how to drive a stickshift. Recently I started a youtube channel where I share make up tutorials too. My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness. I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Supportive and focused, he channels his energy into music and values meaningful relationships.
participant_2.background: I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music. I am a goalie. And, my best friend is Calden. I live at home with my dad and brother. I got into an accident and totaled my car.

content.text: Hi! I'm trying to cope with my breakup. I'm not sure what to do.
Oh no, that's so tough. I'm here for you if you need to talk.
Well, my boyfriend of 5 years broke up with me a few weeks ago. We were living together and everything.
Oh, that's really rough. I'm so sorry.
Yeah, it's been tough. I'm not sure what to do.
Well, it's okay to feel lost. Breakups are hard. It's going to take some time to heal.
I know. I just feel like I don't know who I am anymore.
That's normal. You've been through a lot. Give yourself some time.
I know. But you're going to be okay. Just keep moving forward.
No problem. I'm here for you.
